resources.string: A New ROM Update is Available!

This program is provided by Eddon Systems. If you have a particular project in mind, feel free to inquire on the website!

Zoo Keeper is a small program designed to provide for OTA updates and customizations of the WildLife Android ROM. It has no connection with the Apache project of the same name or ROM's for phones other than OnePlus

Automatic updates require the Cron service to be enabled. At the given time, the system will check for a new ROM and notify you. Optionally, it can auto-download, prepare an OpenRecovery script to flash the ROM (when you reboot into a compatible recovery), and even reboot for you.

Currently, only modern versions of TWRP and Phil'z Recovery are supported. You can also schedule your own tasks with the Cron services and tweak the ad-blocker.

Please report bugs to evan+zookeeper@eddon.systems

The whitelist can contain partial string matches or a regex. The blacklist must contain the fully qualified hostname you wish to block. Any hosts not listed will be treated as per standard Moab blocking. If you have problems, switch it off! Alternately, long-press the switch to turn it off for just a few seconds.
